page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area covers 12 square kilometres. These are the places: Burnham Overy Staithe, Burnham Overy Town, Peterstone Farm, Marsh House Farm, Marsh Farm and Model Farm. We have a dismantled Railway, a dismantled Corn Mill in Overy and a river called the River Burn. There was an old Hotel in Overy which is now closed down. Our 12 kilometres also cover Holkham Estate which is owned by the Cokes who are friends of the Royal Family. Holkham Park is one of the finest Parks in England. Peterstone brick works is still there but it is no longer in use. Holkham Church is in the Park. In Overy there was a school which has now been turned into the village hall. Most of our area is marsh land. In Overy there was an old swimming pool which is in the middle of the creek.
